item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 1st May
item.description:
There is a gully that should collect the run off from the quarry, this is partly exposed and needs a good clear out to ensure the run off is taken under the road. Also the grips in this are need to be cleaned as they are full of debris, likely would be a couple of barrows full and will require a shovel. Linked to 11452597.
Report on FixMyStreet
